empty.title: No provider connections found
empty.subtitle: You don't have any provider connections, yet. Use the Create connection button to create the resource.
table.header.name: Name
modal.delete.title: Delete provider connection
modal.delete.content: Deleting {{name}} is irreversible. The provider connection will no longer be available for creating new clusters, but clusters that were previously created using the connection are not affected. Are you sure that you want to continue?
addConnection.title: Add Provider Connection

addConnection.providerName.placeholder: Select a provider where you want to provision clusters
